UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile in the Pamoja app.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity, matches Firebase Auth UID.

nickname.description: The user's display name, which can be different from their username.

dateJoined.description: The date and time the user joined the app.

lastLogin.description: The date and time of the user's last login.

avatarId.description: The ID of the user's chosen animated avatar.

penpalIds.description: A list of user IDs that this user is connected with as pen pals.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user, corresponding to the Firebase Auth UID.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is designed to manage user profiles securely and efficiently. We leverage path-based ownership for user profiles stored in `/users/{userId}` to ensure data privacy.
